description: This Kotlin source file defines a DialogFragment subclass 'ReviewsListDialogFragment' used to display and manage reviews for a specific target (such as a menu item or restaurant). It handles UI setup, interactions for adding, editing, and deleting reviews, and observes data from a RatingsRepository to update content dynamically.

classes.name: ReviewsListDialogFragment
classes.description: A DialogFragment that displays a list of reviews for a specific target, allowing users to add, edit, or delete reviews.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the fragment with arguments specifying the review target type and ID, and sets the title.

methods.name: onCreateDialog
methods.description: Creates and configures the dialog UI, sets up RecyclerView with an adapter, and observes review data to update the UI accordingly.

methods.name: newInstance
methods.description: Static helper method to instantiate a new ReviewsListDialogFragment with specified title, target type, and ID.
